Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Pendant
Description: Ovoid pendant with a rounded surface as well as a flat one. This jewellery was possibly inspired by the representation of a pomegranate or of a small shell.
